game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost family heirloom.
game.description: A valuable family heirloom has gone missing, and it's up to you to find and return it to its rightful owner. The heirloom is a rare golden locket with a small ruby set into the center.

task.objective: Investigate the scene of the theft.
task.description: Speak to the staff at Ironfist Manor and see if anyone saw or heard anything suspicious on the night of the theft.

task.objective: Search the surrounding area for clues.
task.description: Come back to this area with a lantern and search every inch of ground, including under rocks and in bushes. See if you can find any sign of where the thief might have gone.

task.objective: Return the heirloom to Grimbold Ironfist.
task.description: Once you've found the heirloom, return it to Grimbold and claim your reward.
